price: وە بەڕاستی ئێمە سزای دونیایان پێ دەچێژین جگە لە سزای ھەرە گەورە (ی دۆزەخ) تابگەڕێنەوە (بۆ لای خوا)
arabic: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanudhīqannahum mina al-ʿadhābi al-adnā dūna al-ʿadhābi al-akbari laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: And surely, We will let them taste
